name: Farmer Adventure
description:
The story of a farmer from whom an ancient dragon stole a sheep. And now you need to do everything to get it back. Embark on an incredible adventure, visit an ancient castle and appear on the doorstep to its ruler, enter the trust of bandits, fight a giant boss and much more awaits you in Farmer Adventure.

Help various characters who find themselves in a difficult situation, fight against monsters that have invaded the magical forest.

The game is a 2D platformer adventure in which you need to complete various assignments to get the desired result.
